Map speed tests

```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(mapdeck)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("data/LOC-01_Combined_Nav_TSG_Fluo_HydroFIA.txt")
```


```{r}
key <- 'pk.eyJ1IjoiYmxvbmd3b3J0aCIsImEiOiJjbHI3NmtzMmYyZTBuMmluOGZ4dmhuaWFqIn0.eW7yUb_wqL7LQJOURH9IRQ'
mapdeck(token = key, style = mapdeck_style("dark")) |> 
  add_scatterplot(
    data = df, 
    lat = "Latitude", 
    lon = "Longitude",
    radius = 10, 
    fill_colour = "Dye_ppb",
    layer_id = "dye_layer",
    palette = "plasma")

```
